content.rendered:
Joanna is a teacher with years of experience. Originally from Poland, where she started her teaching career, she also lived and worked in France and now, in the UK she has been teaching across many educational settings for over 15 years.

Joanna has been working as a teacher since 1997 teaching history, literature and languages (mainly English but also Polish as foreign and French). She has taught across all levels (from beginners to advanced including teaching for GCSE, A levels in English and Polish and university entry exams) and ages (5 – adult).

Joanna has been with Regent since April 2016 teaching English to Pre-intermediate and Intermediate level students preparing them to study HND courses and take Password tests. I also taught Study Skills. I prepare lessons, conduct tests, and undertake a variety of administrative tasks including entry tests and progression tests marking. But the most rewarding duty is to motivate my students and to see them grow in their proficiency.
